long_description: The lightweight Shimano Ultegra SM-BBR60 Bottom Bracket is a replacement bottom bracket constructed with high precision for incredible smoothness and maximum power transfer while pedaling. Minimal bearing interface ensures smooth rolling action. Hollowtech II technology provides optimum balance of light weight and rigidity; Shimano Ultegra SM-BBR60 Bottom Bracket is compatible with Hollowtech II cranksets.
short_description: The lightweight Shimano Ultegra SM-BBR60 Bottom Bracket is a replacement bottom bracket constructed with high precision for incredible smoothness and maximum power transfer while pedaling.
